name: Bloody Shrimp
author: RICHIE2
summary: I like serving this dish as brunch when an all-day barbeque is planned. I usually serve it over rice with lemon wedges as a garnish.
ingredients: 2 pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: In a large bowl, mix together the Bloody Mary mix, hot pepper sauce, and lemon juice
Stir in the shrimp and halibut chunks
Preheat a grill for high heat
Place a grill pan over the grilling surface, or you may use a heavy sheet of foil that has holes poked in it with a fork
Drain the shrimp and halibut in a colander, discarding the marinade
Grill for 10 to 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the seafood is browned and opaque
